Title: A Wing And A Prayer
Plot: Entrepreneur Kiwi Mark Oremland had a dream. The dream was to own his own classic DC3 airliner, the once dominant lady of the aviation industry and fly it from England to New Zealand, retracing the famous journey of pioneer aviator Jean Batten. With a eclectic team of aviation enthusiasts, an engineer and the mandatory two pilots on board, Mark set out on what would become an epic journey; with breakdowns, fuel shortages and red tape all ahead.
